content.prompt: Let y = f (x) be a twice-differentiable function such that f (1) = 2 and  dy dx = y 3 +3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EE5@ . What is the value of  d 2 y d x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C49@ at x = 1 ?
